snippet.title: Anarkade | Coming 23rd September | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into the chaotic world of Anarkade, a multiplayer arena shooter with pixel art graphics and intense platforming action. 🎮

*Unleash the Madness*
Run, jump, and frag your opponents with explosive weaponry causing hilarious hijinks. With intuitive controls, easy to learn but hard to master, perform moves like wall jumps and corner hangs to strike from anywhere. 💥

*Customise Your Chaos*
Stand out in the wasteland with absurdly customisable characters. Choose from a range of hats, gas masks, Viking apparel, and more. 🎩🛡️

*Diverse Arenas with Unique Physics*
Battle across eclectic arenas with distinctive physics and themes. From icy realms to ancient Egypt and the vast expanse of space, every stage offers a new challenge. 🌌❄️🏜️

*Arsenal of Insanity*
Equip yourself with unique weapons, from Gatling guns and bazookas to bowling bombs. Loot crates for power-ups and additional firepower. 🔫💣

*Multiplayer Mayhem*
Jump into local matches or online multiplayer. Randomly generated arenas ensure endless replayability and fun. 🎉🌐

*Anarkade* is a game for everyone—easy to pick up and put down, making it a fun option for friends to play something quickly. Whether you’re a seasoned player or new to the genre, get ready to unleash your inner warrior and conquer the arenas! 🚀🔥🔥

-----------------
*WISHLIST*
